other_title: Shin chan en busca de las bolas perdidas (Spanish)
クレヨンしんちゃん 暗黒タマタマ大追跡 (Japanese)
蠟筆小新-黑暗珠珠大追擊 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: The Nohara family inadvertently gets involved in a dispute between two clans who are fighting to possess a strange sphere claimed to be able to bring back to life a powerful evil being. Shin-chan and his family must run away to protect Himawari since she ended up swallowing the small orb.
